attributes.title: hated it
attributes.review: downloaded to support the beloved ✨orange✨ but can’t take the app anymore it’s so glitchy, takes up wayyyy too much storage, and took absolutely forever to download it’s ridiculous. if this app is any representation of how trumpy boi is gonna run the country we are NOT in good hands❤️

attributes.title: no good what so ever ✨
attributes.review: this app will not only be a waste for your home screen, but it carries a horrifying picture of a tangerine as soon as you open it. no good of an app. drains your battery life so quickly and eats 99% of your storage. trust me, do NOT get this app. for your phones own safety 🥰🥰🥰✨

attributes.title: Lies
attributes.review: The Trump app is lying it’s only making of bad press for his competitors but it doesn’t say anything that he’s done he’s not taking ownership when you try to make his compadres look bad so if you’re going to tell the store you have to tell the full story

attributes.title: Absolutely Terrible
attributes.review: This is app causes my device to crash constantly whenever I try to open it. It astounds me how terrible this app is. I wanted to see what his “plans” are. And I couldn’t even do that. This is app is as awful as the administration it serves

attributes.title: WORST APP IN THE HISTORY OF LIFE LIVING WHATEVER
attributes.review: I hate trump he thinks he runs everything like honestly I hope he posts proof of why he is banning tik tok in the USA he has made the world worse nothin Good at all his family probably wants to commit Suicide at this point honestly by 2021 every social media app will probably be banned by him I HOPE HES NOT PRESIDENT BC THOSE PPL ARE IDIOTS FOR LOVING HIM

attributes.title: ✨💞🧚‍♀️Trump 2020😌💫but on a gravestone✨💞🧚‍♀️
attributes.review: The app is just aweful. It’s glitchy, it keeps crashing, and it just doesn’t work at all. On top of this absolutely 𝓼𝓱𝓲𝓽𝓽𝔂 app, trump is racist, homophobic, transphobic, sexist, and much more. Now i’m not that into politics but donald trump is utterly horrible and we’re not going down without a fight.

attributes.title: a fellow gen z 💅🏼 aka the elite generation
attributes.review: you tried to ban tik tok so now we shall assemble and DELETE the trump app. i opened the app and immediately started having issues, it runs slow and overall isn’t a good app. i think it’s best for apple to remove this app. thank you & have a good day 💗

attributes.title: Trash
attributes.review: After having the app for awhile it was way too glitchy and wasn’t functional at all. I also didn’t like the set up, very unprofessional and thug like. Trump should look at Tik tok as an example of a great app and platform and take after Tik toks steps in success.

attributes.title: Full of bugs
attributes.review: This app is just riddled with bugs, seriously at every point. I’m 50 years old and I want an app that works but this one just doesn’t. It’s a mess. It needs to be taken down so it doesn’t bug anyone else’s phone.

attributes.title: HORRID
attributes.review: This app is the worst app every created! The ORANGE claims ✨it🧚🏻‍♀️ will help our country but every decision it makes is insurmountably detrimental to our people and especially someone in a place of power like POTUS should not say things that influence the country towards racism, sexism, and countless other horrible things
